summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Greenwood Park Annex, being the Alley between Dibble Avenue Northwest and 8th Avenue Northwest from West 83rd Street to West 85th Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16691 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
